text: 6 Trump campaign workers at MY Tulsa Rally tested posative for Covid-19. I am NOT concerned! I was SMART and made them sign MY Coronavirus waiver. So they CAN'T sue ME! However, the 6 workers' familys, friends, & neighbors MUST sign My waiver IMMEDIATELY! #TrumpsCoronavirusRally
